remember 2 seed, okay???

1. Run the start-windows-x86.bat(or the amd64 one)
2. Wait for the JPCSP to pop out
3. Go to File -> Load UMD and open KH BBS
4. Hit Run
5. And, well it should work...Unless your system specs is really far below. If it is, you will not even able to open the main menu...

Well, i think it's an unsolved bug. The guys at JPCSP Team said it can't play BBS fully, but they are still working on it. Try using the newest build, maybe they have the problem.

@BlOodDeviL
Have you checked your system requirements(Like can you play Black Ops or any Hi-Spec Games)?

It also can be caused a bug in the emulator. They say that some bugs existed (like characters walking out the pause menu or choppy sounds) and their trying to fix that out.

Try finding the latest build of JPCSP or tell them what are your problems and maybe they can fix it.
